description: Beacon PeerDAS metrics according to the beacon metrics specs

panels.title: PeerDAS
Data column sidecars submitted for processing
Data column sidecars verified for gossip

targets.expr: sum by(job) (increase(beacon_data_column_sidecar_processing_requests_total{client_name=~"$client", job=~"$job", supernode=~"$nodes"}[$__interval])) - sum by(job) (increase(beacon_data_column_sidecar_processing_successes_total{client_name=~"$client", job=~"$job", supernode=~"$nodes"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: Column processing failures
Full runtime of data column sidecars gossip verification
Total count of reconstructed columns
Time taken to reconstruct columns
Time taken to compute data column sidecar, including cells, proofs and inclusion proof
Time taken to verify data column sidecar inclusion proof
Runtime of single data column kzg verification
Runtime of batched data column kzg verification
Total count of columns in custody within the data availability boundary
Gossipsub
Number of gossip messages sent to each topic
Number of gossip messages received from each topic (including duplicates)
Number of gossip messages received from each topic (deduplicated)
Number of bytes sent to each topic
Number of bytes received from each topic (including duplicates)
Number of bytes received from each topic (deduplicated)
Req/Resp
Number of requests sent
Number of requests received
Number of responses sent
Number of responses received
Number of requests bytes sent
Number of requests bytes received
Number of responses bytes sent
Number of responses bytes received

list.label: Client
list.name: client
list.query: lighthouse, teku, prysm, lodestar, grandine, nimbus

title: PeerDAS metrics
